title: Safari to Firefox....UGH
content: After the introduction of Safari years ago, I have finally recently switched to Firefox. I like it, but the font thing is about to send me packing. I just cannot get a decent automatic display of all websites. I never had an issue with Safari. Example: Gmail's body section is way too small, no matter how much I try to enlarge it, it just doesn't want to enlarge. I mean, this is really a hassle. Is there a simple setting in Firefox that can duplicate Safari's handling of text/fonts? I really would like to use it as my default browser, but it's really getting annoying.
creator: hikerwest2014

title: how do I stop updates,it keeps getting sower and crappier. I may as well go back to chrome
content: How about a firefox light without all the crapware you have been adding.?

content: every time i go to play words with friends it says half the page crashed not sure what to do

title: Printing
content: Whenever I print my transfer transcript, it will always combine both the pages into one page. Using other browsers, I would be able to just print the first page but I do not have the option in Firefox. I would like to be able to just print the first page and not the combined page 1 and 2. Thank you.
creator: meldy6223

title: Minimizing Firefox windows sometimes will not open on click on the taskbar and windows error sound will play.
content:
This has started to day, I'm running it on Windows 11 and if I minimize a windows sometimes I am unable to reopen from the taskbar, I would see the browser window flash for 1 second and then a window error bell sound will play, but there is no error message. The only way I can get back that window is to right click the icon in the taskbar and click Restore on the rightclick pane. I would have to do this everytime this happens.

I don't know what caused this, it was fine most of the day and just started late afternoon. Anyone have a clue to the root of this issue and what's your advice?
creator: deepmidorisea

title: not saving
content: i deleted firefox because it stopped saving a progressive game that i play daily. the game is wildhunt on fb.one day i had all but 2 areas saved and the next day they were all gone..which means i have to start over,,,that is impossible, it is thousands of mb of data and hundreds or thousands of dollars and hundreds of hours....i tried to download it again and all it wanted to do was repair, so i let it repair,,DID NOT resolve the problem..now i don't know what to do.
